Author: masterman
Title: [ANN] [ROUND A of Sale] Ternion - hybrid crypto exchange with a fiat gateway
Body: Ternion Token Sale is closed, bounty participants still have their tokens, other ICO contributors got refunded. Tokens of bounty participants are subdue to the conditions stated in regard to TRN in our wp. See chapter 7.2, for example, where it states that, "all the TRN tokens that have been received as a part of the promotions can be only sold in one year." TRN bounty tokens will be released after a year. And in one year, it is most likely that the Exchange will open up for public trading.

Author: masterman
Title: [ANN] [ROUND A of Sale] Ternion - hybrid crypto exchange with a fiat gateway
Body: Currently, the Exchange will operate only as an institutional one until the market turns, for retail clients did not bring sufficient amount of trading volume. Please read more about our decision here. Thank you for your support! Feel free to ask any questions.

Author: masterman
Title: [ANN] [ROUND A of Sale] Ternion - hybrid crypto exchange with a fiat gateway
Body: Hi, TRN will be available on the Ternion Exchange, it is not available on other exchanges. TRN token can be withdrawn after the end of ICO, or as soon as we reach the ICO cap and release the product. We have extended the ICO because of the changed market conditions. If we allow users to withdraw their tokens before the end of ICO, then the tokens might get listed on another exchange and this will lead to 2 separate markets for the token: the ICO one and the other one. And this outcome is not the most appealing or favourable scenario.

Author: DeViL303
Title: [ANN] [ROUND A of Sale] Ternion - hybrid crypto exchange with a fiat gateway
Body: Phore Development Update — November 5, 2018 Phore announced a new exchange listing with a direct US Dollar fiat gateway on the high-security, licensed exchange, Ternion. Phore (PHR) will be listed for trading on the Ternion Exchange upon its launch on November 15th. The $PHR listing will go live on the exchange with a PHR/BTC pairing followed by a PHR/USD fiat pairing in January 2019. Body: We totally agree. Trust means a lot, and treating your customer right should be priority number one. We also noticed the same pattern in the industry - poor customer support. And that is why we created Ternion - to make a difference, especially in the way exchanges treat their clients.

Author: masterman
Title: [ANN] [ROUND A of Sale] Ternion - hybrid crypto exchange with a fiat gateway
Body: 1.) Access to a lot of coins that other exchanges do not have. 2.) Fiat w/d and deposits via bank acc and cards. 3.) Availability to margin trading 4.) In perspective debit cards. 5.) In perspective security token trading and listing 6.) Good user interface 7.) Good customer support

Author: masterman
Title: [ANN] [ROUND A of Sale] Ternion - hybrid crypto exchange with a fiat gateway
Body: Thank you! The exchange is already live and is generating daily revenues. Here is the link to the personal cabinet https://my.ternion.exchange

Author: masterman
Title: [ANN] [ROUND A of Sale] Ternion - hybrid crypto exchange with a fiat gateway
Body: Hi, to answer your question 1, our Matching Engine has a capability to hold up to 125 000 transactions per second. We have actually written a whole article regarding out matching engine that you can read here. 2. A hybrid structure will entail both centralized and decentralized aspects: we are starting as a centralized entity, but we are planning to add features that will allow peer-to-peer trading on alt coin markets against BTC. You can learn more about our plans on our roadmap on our website: ternion.io  Thank you for being a part of our community! Please let us know if you have anymore question.

Author: drays
Title: [ANN] [ROUND A of Sale] Ternion - hybrid crypto exchange with a fiat gateway
Body: Downloaded versions make perfect sense in case of working with decentralized exchange. However in case of centralized one the benefit is not clear.  One reason I may think of - downloaded version could be faster than the online one, in case of slow connection or overloaded exchange, because the required network traffic between you and the exchange engine is much lower. So that version might have some advantage when the exchange lags.  Another possible reason - they want users to get used/test the downloaded version, to make switching to the hybrid/decentralized version smoother. Future hybrid exchange version could provide some features, which downloaded version could take advantage of.

Author: Rigorous
Title: [ANN] [ROUND A of Sale] Ternion - hybrid crypto exchange with a fiat gateway
Body: Then the market is an idiot, because centralized exchanges defeat the whole point of blockchain: that the ledger is public and transparent. That means those parts where the ledger is private and opaque, there is a high risk of manipulation, such as self-trading and fake buy and sell walls.  Therefore I am quite skeptical there can be such a thing as a good hybrid exchange. Because if some transactions cannot be traced, all decentralized transactions connected to those untraceable transactions cannot be fully traced. Thereby a hybrid exchange marries the disadvantages of decentralization (slow, hard to scale, frontrunning) with the disadvantages of centralization (single point of failure, need to trust the institute not to commit fraud, KYC/AML).

Author: Thishastoend
Title: [ANN] [ROUND A of Sale] Ternion - hybrid crypto exchange with a fiat gateway
Body: Exchange was promised in q2, not done. Then it was promised in mid september, (we're here now) and nothing is done. Roadmap promises margin trading on exchange in q3 and start of dex development, not delivered either. Its been 2 months and project barely gathered $150k since july and now they claim they will only release exchange if $5m soft cap is reached when they only gathered $1.6m total. At this rate it will take 45 months to happen which is pretty much never.

Author: Rudolf_Medvedev_Ternion
Title: [ANN] [ROUND A of Sale] Ternion - hybrid crypto exchange with a fiat gateway
Body: Hello there.  On the contrary. The exchange was promised in Q2. We made the private cabinet publicly usable for the ICO, and successfully transformed it into an exchange cabinet, which you can use with ease to verify your identity, buy Ternion tokens and already receive additional bounty tokens to exchange later on when they unlock ( This is due to the partners ExchangeDrop demand). At the same time, the matching engine was released publicly, and the order book which is being used already by our several Institutional clients can be seen at any point. We we are not releasing the exchange yet to the public is because we will not satisfy the capacity of the public inflow, due to the downtrend in the ICO market. And we do not intend to release something half done or partially well made.  Margin trading is already ready. We will present it to the public in November. Everything is fully on track and ongoing.  Yes, we do need to reach our Soft Cap in order to be fully launched with the exchange without any set back.  Yes again, if we do not reach it. All the gathered funds shall be returned back to their initial owners.  In addition, we have signed a new large scale partner which has been in the market already in classical retail for over 10 years. And we will be releasing news sooner than you can expect.  At this current moment we are using our own funds to create everything. As the ICO has not reached its soft cap. And it should be noticed. We have our own unique technology, private cabinets, the support is looking after everyone and people can agree with this point.  We are glad you are looking after the project, and if you wish to see more technology which we have not yet released, please do contact us in our Telegram group. We will be glad to show it to you.

Author: masterman
Title: [ANN] [ROUND A of Sale] Ternion - hybrid crypto exchange with a fiat gateway
Body: Hi! The main goal is to create one of the best and leading gateways for trading, spending and earning. The coin itself is an incentive with a burn model. No, we do not plan to have the ability to trade binary options because the industry is partially illegal in many countries.

Author: masterman
Title: [ANN] [ROUND A of Sale] Ternion - hybrid crypto exchange with a fiat gateway
Body: Hi there! We are currently in talks with 2 European banks. We can not disclose it now, but when we are done with the onobarding process, we will make an announcement. Make sure to check our social media for updates!

Author: masterman
Title: [ANN] [ROUND A of Sale] Ternion - hybrid crypto exchange with a fiat gateway
Body: Hi, thank you for your question. We have been operating before with segregated client accounts in finance. And we decided to use the same approach with crypto currencies. Holding all the funds in medium in small separate wallets. You can see how it works when you participate in the token sale, for instance. You send the funds to different wallets and the funds get separated. Thus, even if a wallet gets hacked, then only a small amount of funds gets exposed.

Body: huge number of modern people are constantly using the opportunities of digital technologies – social networks,  various advertising platforms, content exchanges. All this is very popular. Today, blockchain technology is being actively introduced – an excellent opportunity to create decentralized, secure platforms for working with different types of data.TERNION Project is an innovative media platform based on the existing advantages of blockchain technology. This is an excellent opportunity for users  – they can not only access the necessary content, but also monetize their own efforts to create this content.

Author: erikay
Title: [ANN] [ROUND A of Sale] Ternion - hybrid crypto exchange with a fiat gateway
Body: Blockchain technology is developing in ways in which we never thought possible and that is clearly evident as we witness a true technological Renaissance. Since the dawning of Bitcoin, which ushered us into the age of legitimate digital currency solutions, we have experienced profoundly brilliant minds come together for the greater good and that is worth noting. From Smart contracts, to Artificial Intelligence, new advancements in science and business are being integrated into the blockchain and as a result, we have seen an explosive growth in the markets with massive global attention. We believe that decentralized digital currencies like Bitcoin, Ethereum and many other digital coin will fundamentally change how the world views and uses money: cheaper, faster and safer transactions; more privacy and freedom; a significantly better user experience; and ultimately, more equality through giving everyone in the world access to the same financial system, no matter who they are or where they are from.Broad adoption of Blockchain technology has the potential of reshaping daily activities and industries and that is where TERNION comes into the picture. WHAT IS THIS PROJECT ABOUT? Ternion is a hybrid crypto exchange with a fiat gateway and integrated merchant services. The Ternion Exchange is a regulated, licensed and centralized  entity which allows crypto to crypto, fiat to crypto and crypto to fiat trading.  In the post Token Sale stage the exchange will become hybrid. It will facilitate a decentralized exchange with a centralized one. The project have good perspective and will surely be a success.

Title: [ANN] [ROUND A of Sale] Ternion - hybrid crypto exchange with a fiat gateway
Body: These are the problems we want to solve: Lack of regulated and licensed Crypto-Fiat exchanges Poorly executed customer service on Crypto-Fiat exchanges Each exchange demands to pass its own KYC and AML policies that take a long time to get verified Lack of transparency and reliability due to the absence of annual audits Most Exchange API are websocket based There is a deficit of payment systems that allow smooth cryptocurrency transactions No clear guidelines towards capital support of the post ICO business

Author: Rudolf_Medvedev_Ternion
Title: [ANN] [ROUND A of Sale] Ternion - hybrid crypto exchange with a fiat gateway
Body: But of Course!!! Thats the point of the License. To show the banks what we want to do. To be transparent about it. To show that we do the AML and KYC of the clients. That the funds can be proven and clean.  I would not risk clients money to be stored under a 3rd party account that thinks we are selling pickles.  License is the starting point of the conversation. Which then leads to the other half. That is how we are going now. ( And its going fairly ok. (Could always be better, always)).  Join the Telegram group btw. Will be happy to have you there.

Author: Icoha2018
Title: [ANN] [ROUND A of Sale] Ternion - hybrid crypto exchange with a fiat gateway
Body: The idea looks very good. The Ternion Liquidity Fund supports two business models and is the backbone of the Exchange and Payment Processor. The fund is also responsible for acquiring the token using a quarter of the company's profits and burning them to combat inflation. The fund also holds a quarter of the accumulated amount to be able to pay for the future expansion of Ternion globally.

Title: [ANN] [ROUND A of Sale] Ternion - hybrid crypto exchange with a fiat gateway
Body: Hey mate.  I decided to write to you myself.  The case is the following.  The platform which you can download is from Metaquotes. We took their platform and developed the software to trade cryptos and have crypto accounts in addition to Fiat accounts.  The platform can sustain up to 250 000 users at the same time in the same second. Which is literally 6 times more than any web platform can handle. The button for google play works when you use your android device. It allows you to download the Android APP.  Metaquotes software has been in the market for over 20 years. And we decided to build it up and improve it.  Regarding the web platform. No worries. Will be in place as well when the exchange is opened for trading.  We arent going to miss  out our target audience ))

Author: masterman
Title: [ANN] [ROUND A of Sale] Ternion - hybrid crypto exchange with a fiat gateway
Body: Hi there! Currently, only the demo version of the exchange is available, but in the upcoming weeks, the full version will be launched. The exchange will support the major fiat currencies (more details coming soon). Due to our second component, Ternion Payments Processor, the clients will be able to withdraw money to the Payments processor (where they will have a card), and then the client can either transfer it to his bank account or use the Ternion card for purchasing purposes or an other purposes.

Author: diesel_r
Title: [ANN] [ROUND A of Sale] Ternion - hybrid crypto exchange with a fiat gateway
Body: The market of cryptocurrencies is considerably volatile and applying something constant, like legal regulations, to something ever changing, like cryptocurrencies, transforms the future into something more reliable, more secure, but still surprising and innovative at the same time. Our messaging has been throughout consistently clear: we do not want to annihilate the future, we want to create it. Ternion appreciates the benefits and understands the importance of the responsibilities that come hand in hand with the license. Innovations, not fear of legal regulations, need to be the engine of change.

Author: setpass
Title: [ANN] [ROUND A of Sale] Ternion - hybrid crypto exchange with a fiat gateway
Body: There is a lot of hype about the solutions to the shortcomings of crypto platforms. One of the most efficient and feasible solution is a hybrid exchange. Hybrid exchange combines two types of cryptocurrency exchanges: centralized exchanges (CEX) and decentralized exchanges (DEX).  Centralized exchanges are controlled by a single entity, and the system requires all data to be sent and be received by one single point, usually a private server or a hub. A single point of entry makes it easier to access information, and thus making it more susceptible to a leakage. For example, Facebook is a centralized platform. The recent Facebook data breach was easily executed due to the million users’ data being stored in one place.  Transactions executed on a centralized platform are cheaper and more efficient to run than the ones on DEX. Furthermore, centralized exchanges offer a third-party oversight that ensures that all the transactions are executed accurately. Centralized exchanges have been the standard in real world, however, users are troubled that a third-party gains access to their private keys. The main concern is that the keys might be compromised, and the information can be illegally or legally accessed by private individuals, companies or government structures.  In decentralized exchanges all the information passes through many points connected, instead of a central point. A decentralized network relies on host of computer, without a single point-of-connection. It is based on blockchain — constantly growing chain of ordered information, which is built in such a way that the blocks cannot be corrected. They eliminate and avoid censorship of information: to hack information you would have to find a way to access every single point at the same time to hack into the network.  DEX are more expensive, but they are also more trustworthy. They mostly rely on software rather than a third party. Decentralized exchanges are a meeting point for sellers and buyers. They do not offer any guidance or instruments like liquidity, latency or other market instruments that make centralized exchanges more attractive for customers. Decentralized exchanges are not accountable or liable to government or to their users.  So, which platform is safer and more convenient for customers?  Sometimes it is easier to deny both than simply pick one. Hybrid exchanges combine functionality and liquidity of CEX and the privacy and security of DEX. One of the recent developments in the industry is the Hedera hashgraph that will offer a fair public, distributed ledger, decentralization and combines performance and security at its best. From its whitepaper: “Hedera directly resolves the five fundamental obstacles to mainstream market adoption of public ledger technology: Performance, Security, Stability, Governance, and Regulatory Compliance.”  Another example is the emerging hybrid and licensed, fiat-to-crypto Ternion Exchange. The Exchange combines security and reliability of centralized platforms as well as liberating aspects of decentralization. You can try a demo version of the Exchange here.  Hybrid exchanges are a beginning of digital transformation that we can observe and participate in today.
